root.server.managers

Class CheatingChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • root.server.managers.CheatingChecker

  • public class CheatingChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    Automated system for checking cheating To use you need to create a new object of this class and pass to it the exam's id and the date when it executed
    Author:
    Amit Molek

      private boolean checkTwoExams(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> exam_a, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> exam_b)
      Checks two exams for cheating: first if the number of wrong answers of the exams (exam_a and exam_b) are not the same, they didnt cheat (returns false) passes all the wrong answers of both exams and compares them if they are the same they suspected for cheating, returns true

      • checkForCheating

        private void checkForCheating()
        Checks the exams for cheating Constructs all the wrong answers and compares them to other wrong answers of other exams

      • checkTwoExams

        private boolean checkTwoExams(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> exam_a,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> exam_b)
        Checks two exams for cheating: first if the number of wrong answers of the exams (exam_a and exam_b) are not the same, they didnt cheat (returns false) passes all the wrong answers of both exams and compares them if they are the same they suspected for cheating, returns true
        Parameters:
        exam_a - the first exam you want to check
        exam_b - the second exam you want to check
        Returns:
        true if the exams suspected of cheating, false otherwise

      • getQuestionCorrectAnswer

        private java.lang.Integer getQuestionCorrectAnswer(java.lang.String qus_id)
        Returns the correct answer of the qus_id question
        Parameters:
        qus_id - the id of the question you want to get the correct answer
        Returns:
        the number of the correct answer

        Parameters:
        data - the data of the questions and the student's answers
        Returns:
